trans-unit.target: Espone i tipi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector" /> all'automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per l’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" />, this method returns a pointer to the current instance; otherwise <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" /> questo metodo restituisce un puntatore all’istanza corrente; in caso contrario, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo tipo o membro supporta l'infrastruttura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if multiple selection is allowed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se è consentita la selezione multipla. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo tipo o membro supporta l'infrastruttura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: A collection of UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di provider di automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: true if multiple selection is allowed; otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: true se è consentita la selezione multipla. In caso contrario false.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo tipo o membro supporta l'infrastruttura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="S_OK" /> if successful, or an error value otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <see langword="S_OK" /> se l'operazione viene eseguita correttamente; in caso contrario, un valore di errore.
